ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use system functions just like a computer; View anytime, anywhere with remote viewing via internet, smartphone, and tablet
Receive email alerts, with photo, when motion is detected on your property; Record over 2 years' worth of footage on the included 500 GB hard drive
Choose motion-activated recording or H.264 compression to maximize storage space; Super resolution cameras provide crisp and detailed video
Monitor up to 100 feet away in complete darkness with automatic night vision; Weather-resistant camera housing provides superior functioning through all types of weather
Anti-vandal mount ensures camera cables cannot be tampered with; Easily connect to DVR with 65-foot cables (8 Included)
